TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit LazyInitializer extends System.Object
public ref class LazyInitializer abstract sealed

span.span: Provides lazy initialization routines.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这些例程避免了需要分配一个专用的迟缓初始化实例，而是使用引用来确保目标已在访问时进行了初始化。These routines avoid needing to allocate a dedicated, lazy-initialization instance, instead using references to ensure targets have been initialized as they are accessed. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 EnsureInitialized 来延迟初始化值，以使用布尔值来跟踪初始化是否已发生，并将对象用作互斥锁。The following example demonstrates how to use EnsureInitialized to lazily initialize a value using a Boolean value to track whether initialization has already happened and an object to use as the mutual exclusion lock. ```vb Dim _data As ExpensiveData = Nothing Dim _dataInitialized As Boolean = False Dim _dataLock As Object = Nothing ' ... Dim name = LazyInitializer.EnsureInitialized(_data, _dataInitialized, _dataLock) ``` ```csharp ExpensiveData _data = null; bool _dataInitialized = false; object _dataLock = new object(); // ... ExpensiveData dataToUse = LazyInitializer.EnsureInitialized(ref _data, ref _dataInitialized, ref _dataLock); ```

threadsafe.span: 的方法是线程安全的，可同时从多个线程调用。

span.span: The methods of are thread-safe and may be called from multiple threads concurrently.
Lazy Initialization

summary.span: Initializes a target type if it hasn't already been initialized.

span.span: Initializes a target type if it hasn't already been initialized.

typeparam.span: 要初始化的引用的类型。

span.span: The type of the reference to be initialized.

param.name: target
param.span: A reference to initialize if it has not already been initialized.

span.span: A reference to initialize if it has not already been initialized.

summary.span: Initializes a target reference type with the type's parameterless constructor if it hasn't already been initialized.

span.span: Initializes a target reference type with the type's parameterless constructor if it hasn't already been initialized.
The initialized object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法只能用于引用类型。This method may only be used on reference types. 若要确保值类型的初始化，请参阅 `EnsureInitialized`的其他重载。To ensure initialization of value types, see other overloads of `EnsureInitialized`. 此方法可由多个线程同时用于初始化 `target`。This method may be used concurrently by multiple threads to initialize `target`. 当多个线程同时访问此方法时，可能会创建 `T` 的多个实例，但只能将一个实例存储到 `target` 中并返回。In the event that multiple threads access this method concurrently, multiple instances of `T` may be created, but only one will be stored into `target` and returned. 在这种情况下，此方法将不会释放未存储的对象。In such an occurrence, this method will not dispose of the objects that were not stored. 如果必须释放此类对象，则使用重载，该重载采用 `valueFactory` 并释放对象（如果它未引用相同的存储对象）。If such objects must be disposed, use an overload that takes a `valueFactory` and dispose of the object if it does not reference the same stored object.

summary.span: Initializes a target reference type by using a specified function if it hasn't already been initialized.

span.span: Initializes a target reference type by using a specified function if it hasn't already been initialized.
The initialized object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法只能用于引用类型，`valueFactory` 可能不会返回空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing）。This method may only be used on reference types, and `valueFactory` may not return a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic). 若要确保值类型的初始化或允许空引用类型，请参阅 EnsureInitialized 的其他重载。To ensure initialization of value types or to allow null reference types, see other overloads of EnsureInitialized. 此方法可由多个线程同时用于初始化 `target`。This method may be used concurrently by multiple threads to initialize `target`. 当多个线程同时访问此方法时，可能会创建 `T` 的多个实例，但只能将一个实例存储到 `target`中。In the event that multiple threads access this method concurrently, multiple instances of `T` may be created, but only one will be stored into `target`. 在这种情况下，此方法将不会释放未存储的对象。In such an occurrence, this method will not dispose of the objects that were not stored. 如果必须释放此类对象，则由调用方确定是否未使用对象，并适当地释放对象。If such objects must be disposed, it is up to the caller to determine if an object was not used and to then dispose of the object appropriately.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将 `initialized` 指定为 true，则不会进行进一步的初始化。If `initialized` is specified as true, then no further initialization occurs.
